description_en: Corpse Fleet officers directing hordes of converted covet these wicked talons. Powered by a built-in energy pack, these melee weapons resemble skeletal claws made of bone and steel. The claw weeps frost in areas with an atmosphere, and its touch freezes the skin of any living creature it strikes.
source: Starfinder Dead Suns Adventure Path pg. 247, Starfinder #3: Splintered Worlds pg. 49
